description: Enable seamless access and management of Google Drive files through a standardized protocol. Facilitate listing, reading, and interacting with Google Drive resources directly from your LLM applications. Simplify integration with Google Drive by exposing its capabilities as MCP tools and resources.

capabilities.name: drive_changes
capabilities.description: List changes in Drive

capabilities.name: drive_file_metadata
capabilities.description: Get metadata of a file

capabilities.name: drive_folder_children
capabilities.description: List contents of a folder

capabilities.name: drive_search
capabilities.description: Search files in Google Drive

capabilities.name: drive_file_content
capabilities.description: Retrieve content of a Google Drive file

capabilities.name: drive_create
capabilities.description: Create file or folder

capabilities.name: drive_upload
capabilities.description: Upload or update file content

capabilities.name: drive_append_text
capabilities.description: Append plain text to an existing text file in Drive

capabilities.name: drive_delete
capabilities.description: Trash or delete a file

capabilities.name: drive_share
capabilities.description: Manage file permissions

capabilities.name: drive_comment
capabilities.description: Add a comment to a file

capabilities.name: drive_copy
capabilities.description: Copy a file or folder to a new location

capabilities.name: drive_rename
capabilities.description: Rename a file or folder

capabilities.name: drive_star
capabilities.description: Star or unstar a file or folder

capabilities.name: drive_restore
capabilities.description: Restore a file from the trash

capabilities.name: drive_versions_list

capabilities.name: drive_versions_delete
capabilities.description: Delete a specific version of a file

capabilities.name: drive_file_lock
capabilities.description: Lock or unlock a file to prevent changes (Google Workspace only)

capabilities.name: drive_shortcut_create
capabilities.description: Create a shortcut to a file or folder

capabilities.name: drive_permissions_list

capabilities.name: drive_permission_update

capabilities.name: drive_permission_add_domain
capabilities.description: Share file or folder with everyone in a domain

capabilities.name: drive_permission_add_anyone
capabilities.description: Allow anyone with the link to access a file or folder

capabilities.name: drive_file_list_comments
capabilities.description: List all comments on a file

capabilities.name: drive_file_delete_comment

capabilities.name: drive_file_reply_to_comment

capabilities.name: drive_file_delete_reply

capabilities.name: drive_file_move

capabilities.name: drive_file_empty_trash

capabilities.name: drive_shared_drives_list
capabilities.description: List all accessible Shared Drives

capabilities.name: drive_shared_drive_get

capabilities.name: drive_shared_drive_update
